articles.title: In pictures: Solar eclipse creates ‘ring of fire’ - CNN
articles.description: An annular solar eclipse was seen in parts of South America on Wednesday, creating a blazing “ring of fire” in the sky.
articles.content:
An annular solar eclipse was seen in parts of South America on Wednesday, creating a blazing ring of fire in the sky.
Annular solar eclipses occur when the moon passes between Earth and the sun and … [+383 chars]
